page.title: 18TRANSPORT. ROADS AND TRAFFIC
page.content: There are no main trunk roads, one secondary road leading from Ross to Newent and numerous narrow country lanes.The M50 motorway passes through and has a junction with the secondary B4221 at Gorsley.The busiest roads are the M50 and B4221.Our statistics show the amount of traffic on each of these over a half hour period during a week day morning. {VEHICLE M50 B4221 { WEST EAST TOTAL NORTH SOUTH TOTAL CARS 120 101 221 23 18 41 VANS 20 15 35 1 1 2 LOR/ RIES 65 72 137 5 5 10 COACH 1 1 2 1 0 1 BIKES 1 0 1 1 0 1 HORSE 0 0 0 0 0 0 TRAC/ TORS. 0 0 0 0 0 0
